title: Elevator Maintenance Notice
passage:
Notice to All Tenants,

Please be advised that the main elevators in the West Wing will be undergoing scheduled maintenance on Saturday, March 15. The work is -------(131.) to take place between 8:00 AM and 5:00 PM. 

During this period, all three elevators will be out of service. -------(132.), tenants are encouraged to use the service elevator located near the loading dock or the stairs. 

We apologize for any -------(133.) this may cause. We are performing these upgrades to ensure the continued safety and reliability of the building's facilities. -------(134.).

Thank you for your patience.

questions.explanation: 「〜することが予想・予定されている」という慣用表現 be expected to が正解です。
エレベーターが止まるという原因に対し、「結果として（As a result）」別の手段を勧める流れになります。
工事による「不便」を謝罪する定型表現 (A) inconvenience が適切です。

options: Please contact the management office for monthly parking rates.
New security cameras were installed last week.
Normal operation will resume on Sunday morning.
The cafeteria will be serving a special menu.
questions.explanation: メンテナンス終了後の「通常運行の再開」について述べている (C) が締めくくりとして最適です。
